nodes.name: Note

parameters.content:
### Very often your data is not in the right format to insert in a node. you can use the set node to fix it.

### Click the `Execute Workflow` button and double click on the nodes to see the input and output items.

nodes.name: Create or Update record in Google Sheet

nodes.name: Note1

parameters.content:
This is where we put the data in the format that Google Sheets expect. 
This means changing the field name from `name` to `Full name`, dropping all fields except `ID`, `Email` and adding a `Created time` field
